title: Pharmacological evaluation and binding behavior of 4,4′-diamino-2,2′-stilbene disulfonic acid with metal ions using spectroscopic techniques
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Madeeha Shabnam, Eman A. Alabdullkarem, Muhammad Saeed Jan, Saad H. Alotaibi, Khairia Mohammed Al-Ahmary, Muhammad Ibrar, Mohamed Hussien, Asmaa E. Sherif
